# Falcon

> Falcon is a minimalist ASGI/WSGI framework for building mission-critical REST APIs and microservices, with a focus on reliability, correctness, and performance at scale. Falcon encourages the REST architectural style, and tries to do as little as possible while remaining highly effective.

Falcon supports CPython 3.9+ and PyPy 3.9+. It has native `asyncio` support via ASGI, as well as traditional WSGI support, and WebSocket support.

## Docs

- [Installation](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/install.html): How to install Falcon
- [Quickstart](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/quickstart.html): Getting started with Falcon
- [WSGI Tutorial](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/tutorial.html): Step-by-step tutorial for building a WSGI app
- [ASGI Tutorial](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/tutorial-asgi.html): Step-by-step tutorial for building an ASGI app
- [WebSocket Tutorial](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/tutorial-websockets.html): Tutorial for WebSocket support
- [FAQ](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/faq.html): Frequently asked questions

## API Reference

- [Application](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/app.html): The App class (ASGI and WSGI)
- [Routing](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/routing.html): URI routing, CompiledRouter, converters
- [Request and Response](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/request_and_response.html): Request, Response, and media handling
- [Request and Response (WSGI)](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/request_and_response_wsgi.html): WSGI-specific request/response classes
- [Request and Response (ASGI)](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/request_and_response_asgi.html): ASGI-specific request/response classes
- [WebSocket](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/websocket.html): WebSocket support
- [Hooks](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/hooks.html): Before and after hooks
- [Middleware](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/middleware.html): Middleware components
- [Errors](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/errors.html): Error handling and HTTP error classes
- [Status Codes](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/status.html): HTTP status code constants and utilities
- [Media Handlers](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/media.html): JSON, MessagePack, and custom media handlers
- [Multipart](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/multipart.html): Multipart form handling
- [Cookies](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/cookies.html): Cookie handling
- [CORS](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/cors.html): Cross-Origin Resource Sharing
- [Redirects](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/redirects.html): HTTP redirects
- [Testing](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/testing.html): Testing utilities and helpers
- [Typing](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/typing.html): Type annotations
- [Utilities](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/util.html): Utility functions
- [Inspect](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/api/inspect.html): Application inspection utilities

## Recipes

- [Pretty JSON](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/recipes/pretty-json.html): Rendering pretty-printed JSON responses
- [Request ID](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/recipes/request-id.html): Generating unique request IDs
- [Plain Text Handler](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/recipes/plain-text-handler.html): Handling plain text request bodies
- [Raw URL Path](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/recipes/raw-url-path.html): Accessing the raw URL path
- [Header Name Case](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/recipes/header-name-case.html): Controlling header name casing
- [Output CSV](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/recipes/output-csv.html): Streaming CSV responses
- [Multipart Mixed](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/recipes/multipart-mixed.html): Handling multipart/mixed requests
- [msgspec Integration](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/recipes/msgspec-integration.html): Using msgspec for validation and serialization

## Deployment

- [Deployment Introduction](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/deploy/intro.html): Overview of deploying Falcon apps
- [Nginx + uWSGI](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/deploy/nginx-uwsgi.html): Deploying with Nginx and uWSGI

## Community

- [Getting Help](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/community/help.html): Where to get help
- [Contributing](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/community/contributing.html): How to contribute to Falcon
- [Code of Conduct](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/community/coc.html): Community code of conduct

## Optional

- [Changelog](https://falcon.readthedocs.io/en/stable/changes/index.html): Version history and release notes
- [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/falcon/): Falcon on the Python Package Index
- [GitHub](https://github.com/falconry/falcon): Source code repository
